name: lstrojny/fxmlrpc
description: Fast and tiny XML/RPC client with bridges for various HTTP clients

suggest.zendframework/zend-http: To use ZF2 Zend\Http\Client as HTTP client
suggest.zendframework/zend-log: To use ZF2 Zend\Log\Logger as a logger
suggest.zendframework/zendframework1: To use ZF1 Zend_Http_Client as HTTP client
suggest.kriswallsmith/buzz: To integrate Buzz as HTTP client
suggest.guzzle/guzzle: To integrate Guzzle as HTTP client
